title: Increasing bit representation for internet protocol

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the result of using 128-bit addresses instead of 32-bit addresses?

choices.label: 4 times as many addresses are available.
96 times as many addresses are available.
times as many addresses are available.
times as many addresses are available.
